item.description: please rbing your favorite drink, a snack ig you'd like I'll plan for some hummus and chips and anyone can bring whatever they want, maybe just write it on the message board to avoid having too much of the same thing.
item.why: it's about tie, I know I know, all I can say is life became too busy and euchre became neglected- a crime, I know. But here we are, ready!! Come one, come all (well we really need at least 4, hopefully 8, maybe 12).

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: It's an April Euchre meetup, finally!!
